summary: Implemented a new My Profile page and wired it into the protected hash-router with navigation from the Dashboard header. A frontend hook calls a new backend method name (`getCallerNumber`) to fetch a caller-derived unique number, but the diff summary does not provide evidence that the required backend query method is actually implemented in `backend/main.mo`, and the profile-page error-state rendering for unique-number load failures is not fully verifiable due to truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes a new query method that returns the callerâ€™s stable, deterministic "unique number" derived from the caller principal.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend calls `actor.getCallerNumber()` but the provided `backend/main.mo` diff excerpt does not show any added `query` method (e.g., `getCallerNumber`) implementing deterministic principal-derived logic.

missing_requirements.requirement: My Profile page shows an English error state if the unique number cannot be loaded.
missing_requirements.reason: `useGetCallerNumber` suppresses errors by catching and returning `null`, and while `MyProfilePage` captures `numberError`, the relevant UI rendering is truncated so it cannot be confirmed that an explicit English error state is shown when loading fails.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed app-wide React Query client setup (QueryClientProvider configuration).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any REQ; requirements focus on profile page, routing, navigation, and a backend query.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified hash router behavior to apply an inactivity timeout across routes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of adding a profile page, unique number query, or navigation.

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple marketing/landing-page and site component content/theme changes (hero stats, features grid, pricing grid behavior, favicon/SEO, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; appears unrelated to REQ-1/2/3 scope.
